en-GB.name: Leaving Timer Helper
en-GB.summary: Help families prepare to leave with progressive reminder timers
en-GB.description: Leaving Timer Helper creates timers with progressive reminder intervals to help you and your family prepare to leave the house on time. Set a timer for how long until you need to leave, and Alexa will remind you at regular intervals as the time approaches.
examplePhrases: Alexa, ask Leaving Timer Helper to set a timer for 30 minutes
Alexa, ask Leaving Timer Helper how much time do we have
Alexa, ask Leaving Timer Helper to cancel my timer

publishingInformation.testingInstructions: Test by setting various timer durations (e.g., 20 minutes, 90 minutes, 2 hours). Check that reminders are created. Test cancelling timers and checking status.
